Sentence: After a Ceremony, the Commander sends his (Commander) gardener and chauffeur, Nick, to ask Offred to come see him (Nick) in his (Nick) study the following night
(Commander)', "After some time has gone by without Offred becoming pregnant, Serena suggests that Offred have sex with Nick secretly and pass the child off as the Commander's
Serena promises to bring Offred a picture of her (Serena) daughter if she (Serena) sleeps with Nick, and Offred realizes that Serena has always known the whereabouts of Offred's daughter
The same night that Offred is to sleep with Nick, the Commander secretly takes her (Serena) out to a club called Jezebel's, where the Commanders mingle with prostitutes
Soon after Offred returns from Jezebel's, late at night, Serena arrives and tells Offred to go to Nick's room
He (Professor) suggests that Nick arranged Offred's escape but that her (Serena) fate after that is unknown
